issue.title: bafista.ru
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://bafista.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbafista.ru%2F) ### Comment > Сайт обнаруживает AdGuard. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mlt0m6cogu8w8swgksow0sokcwk048073j8hyourlw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.19.0 (4853) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.19045.0 Browser: | Яндекс Браузер License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties (bafista.ru),
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI,
Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `NoCoin Filter List (url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hoshsadiq/adblock-nocoin-list/master/nocoin.txt)`, `User DNS filter (url: none)`, `Malicious URL Blocklist (AdGuard Home) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/urlhaus-filter-agh.txt)`, `Phishing URL Blocklist (AdGuard Home) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/phishing-filter-agh.txt)`, `Botnet IP Blocklist (AdGuard Home) (url: https://malware-filter.gitlab.io/malware-filter/botnet-filter-agh.txt)` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

User filter (url: none) Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)

[https://bafista.ru/kakie-diski-samye-nadezhnye/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbafista.ru%2Fkakie-diski-samye-nadezhnye%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.info/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=NoCoin%2520Filter%2520List%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fhoshsadiq%2Fadblock-nocoin-list%2Fmaster%2Fnocoin.txt%29%2CUser%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=NoCoin%2520Filter%2520List%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fraw.githubusercontent.com%2Fhoshsadiq%2Fadblock-nocoin-list%2Fmaster%2Fnocoin.txt%29%2CUser%2520DNS%2520filter%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29%2CMalicious%2520URL%2520Blocklist%2520%28AdGuard%2520Home%29%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fmalware-filter.gitlab.io%2Fmalware-filter%2Furlhaus-filter-agh.txt%29%2CPhishing%2520URL%2520Blocklist%2520%28AdGuard%2520Home%29%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fmalware-filter.gitlab.io%2Fmalware-filter%2Fphishing-filter-agh.txt%29%2CBotnet%2520IP%2520Blocklist%2520%28AdGuard%2520Home%29%2520%28url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fmalware-filter.gitlab.io%2Fmalware-filter%2Fbotnet-filter-agh.txt%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=15&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=208.14.1.2.3.4.255.256.257&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.19.0+%284853%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fbafista.ru%2Fkakie-diski-samye-nadezhnye%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_t issue.title: myenergycoach.dei.gr

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.8

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://myenergycoach.dei.gr/en/index

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy

_No response_

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Privacy

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
